mapper.insert: INSERT INTO testlib.bookreser(id, book_cd, reser_date, reservechk) VALUES(#{id}, #{book_cd}, (SELECT returndate FROM testlib.bookrent WHERE book_cd = #{book_cd} AND (rentchk='1' OR rentchk='2'))+ 2 day, 1)
UPDATE testlib.bookmst SET reservechk='1' WHERE book_cd=#{book_cd}
mapper.update: UPDATE testlib.bookmst SET rentchk='1', reservechk='0' WHERE book_cd=#{book_cd}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM testlib.bookreser A INNER JOIN tprlib.gr_insa B ON A.id = B.asabn WHERE book_cd=#{book_cd} FETCH first 1 rows only

SELECT B.RETURNDATE, C.KNAME, D.TITLE, D.AUTHOR, A.BOOK_CD, A.RESER_DATE, D.B_GROUP, D.rentchk FROM testlib.bookreser A Left outer join testlib.bookrent B on A.id = B.id and A.book_cd = B.book_cd inner join TPRLIB.GR_INSA C on A.id = C.asabn left outer join testlib.bookmst D on A.book_cd = D.book_cd where co_gb = 'SEOHAN' and B.rentchk in (0, 1, 2, 3) and A.reservechk='1' AND A.id = #{id}

SELECT A.book_cd, B.id, B.reser_date, A.title, A.b_group, A.rentchk, (SELECT kname FROM tprlib.gr_insa WHERE asabn=B.id FETCH first 1 rows only) AS kname FROM testlib.bookmst A INNER JOIN testlib.bookreser B ON A.book_cd=B.book_cd AND A.reservechk=B.reservechk WHERE B.reservechk='1' ORDER BY B.reser_date DESC
